question: Which type of climate does Évora, Portugal, have according to the Köppen-Geiger classification?
asked_question_translated: Which type of climate does Évora, Portugal, have according to the Köppen-Geiger classification?
answer: Évora, Portugal, has a Mediterranean climate (Csa) according to the Köppen-Geiger classification.
answer_translated_eng: Évora, Portugal, has a Mediterranean climate (Csa) according to the Köppen-Geiger classification.
